# NSScroller.UsableParts

**Enumeration**

These constants specify which parts of the scroller are visible.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UsableParts
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.UsableParts.noScrollerParts**: Specifies that the scroller has neither a knob nor scroll buttons, only the knob slot.
- **NSScroller.UsableParts.onlyScrollerArrows**: Specifies that the scroller has only scroll buttons, no knob.
- **NSScroller.UsableParts.allScrollerParts**: Specifies that the scroller has at least a knob, possibly also scroll buttons.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Style**: Constants to specify the scroller style.
- **NSScroller.KnobStyle**: Specify different knob styles.
- **NSScroller.Part**: These constants specify the different parts of the scroller:
- **NSScroller.Arrow**: These constants describe the two scroller buttons and are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/drawArrow(_:highlight:)].
- **NSScroller.ArrowPosition**: These constants specify where the scroller’s buttons appear and are used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/arrowsPosition] property.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
